mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDREPLY VALUES(boardreply_num_seq.nextval, #{boardReplyWriter}, #{boardReplyBoardNum}, #{boardReplyContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select r.boardreply_num as boardreply_num, r.boardreply_writer as boardreply_writer, r.boardreply_boardnum as boardreply_boardnum, r.boardreply_content as boardreply_content, r.boardreply_createdate as boardreply_createdate, r.boardreply_modifydate as boardreply_modifydate, m.member_nickname as member_nickname from boardreply r inner join member m on m.member_num = r.boardreply_writer where r.BOARDREPLY_BOARDNUM=#{boardReplyBoardNum} order by boardreply_createdate desc
mapper.update: update reply set BOARDREPLY_CONTENT=#{boardReplyContent}, BOARDREPLY_MODIFYDATE=sysdate where boardReplyNum=#{BOARDREPLY_NUM}
